topic.title: Incantata -  translations
topic.body:
http://127.0.0.1:43110/13VDeMgRgGf73mHsMrrorXkq4fhUKfBvPz/ (DE)
http://127.0.0.1:43110/19xqgCi5YTsdTxY97Pferz9GuQERzSSVFe/  (EN)

More translations are welcome in general.
the maintainer of the english translation has not the time to follow the developement of the main page, so another en-clone maintainer is welcome. check out the source of the english site, it has some automated translation system (php)
pls. check the rules for language clones and present your clones here.

greetings!

1564202615_15CpwjhYCsGTxsPjJTkyqRvdmDBTF.body:
check out incantata: http://127.0.0.1:43110/19xqgCi5YTsdTxY97Pferz9GuQERzSSVFe
(main page in german: http://127.0.0.1:43110/13VDeMgRgGf73mHsMrrorXkq4fhUKfBvPz)
a creative common card game exclusively made for 0-net. spanish translation welcome :)
